attributes.action: Allow a second referendum so that people should be given a chance to think again
attributes.additional_details: The prospects are not bright; it is very unlikely that the Parliament is going to vote for the Brexit, as it will result according to the current state. It is obvious, that the UK has a divided society, but it is also obvious, that the people do not agree with the Brexit.  The splitting of the EU and the United Kingdom is going to entail negative consequences, as already envisioned.
attributes.background:
I am 16 years old. We live in the 21st century but are still overlooking the things, that we will have to face after this period. There is so much war and instead of taking a stand against it, you endeavor to break the path of community and unity. 

Thank you!
